bio: One of the most important and influential artists of the Chinese contemporary art scene, Fang Lijun (b. 1963) is most famous for his images of bald men—often depicted in large groups, in a variety of settings and poses, often in a humorous and satirical way. Midjourney generations with his name inherit Fang Lijun's expressive brushstrokes, the use of a deep, contrasty color palette, and weird, borderline creepy characters.
